org.eclipse.scada.configuration.infrastructure

Interface SystemNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Documentable, Node
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemNodeImpl

    public interface SystemNode
extends Node
    A representation of the model object 'System Node'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Deployment
    • Drivers
    • Masters
    • Value Archives
    • Applications

    See Also:
    InfrastructurePackage.getSystemNode()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the value of the 'Applications' attribute list.

      Returns the value of the 'Drivers' containment reference list.

      Returns the value of the 'Masters' containment reference list.

      • getDeployment

         getDeployment()
        Returns the value of the 'Deployment' containment reference list. The list contents are of type DeploymentMechanism.

        If the meaning of the 'Deployment' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        the value of the 'Deployment' containment reference list.

      • getDrivers

         getDrivers()
        Returns the value of the 'Drivers' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Driver. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Node'.

        If the meaning of the 'Drivers' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Drivers' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        InfrastructurePackage.getSystemNode_Drivers(), Driver.getNode()

      • getApplications

        FeatureMap getApplications()
        Returns the value of the 'Applications' attribute list. The list contents are of type org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.FeatureMap.Entry.

        If the meaning of the 'Applications' attribute list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...
